song_lyrics: Sadguru āvjo re punah padhārjo re,
Tāp shamāvjo re vhelerā āvjo re... vasmī 1
Prem varsāvjo re, bhakti swīkārjo re... vasmī 2
Jīvan sudhārjo re akhanḍ birājjo re... vasmī 3
title: Sadguru āvjo re punah padhārjo re

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-186: unknown

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
